sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RYEPOOR a town of Hindustan, in the province of Gundwana, and district of Choteesgur. This town, from its population and commerce, may be ranked amongst the first in the Choteesgur district. It contains 3000 huts, and has a stone fort on the north-east side of the town. It is sixty-nine miles from Ruttunpoor. Long. 82. 26. E. Lat. 21. 17. N.
